articles.author: Angela Yang
articles.title: American Eagle sparks backlash for touting Sydney Sweeney's 'great jeans' - Yahoo Home
articles.description: American Eagle’s “great jeans” advertising campaign with actor Sydney Sweeney is at the center of the latest political firestorm online, drawing accusations of racial undertones in its messaging
articles.content:
American Eagles great jeans advertising campaign with actor Sydney Sweeney is at the center of the latest political firestorm online, drawing accusations of racial undertones in its messaging.
